contents:
Meiyou ba? Biru wo jiushi yige jiandingde Pinyin (Ladinghua) yonghuzhe.
Zhe shi wo zhiqian de huida:

Lading hua ye hen hao ya!Zui qima women zai kan American dapian de shihou buhui bei yixie buzhisuowei de yiming gaodao yitouwushui le!
shenme jiao 皇上无话儿？Disu bukan! Jinhou jiao The King's Speech, wufeng xianjie American English,jiandan haodong,you you guoji style.
魔鬼终结者，ni neng gaosu wo zai English yuanming "terminator" li nali neng zhaodao "魔鬼"？


Ruguo bushi pa nimen kandao hui touda, wo zaojiu quanmian gaiyong Ladingzimu li!
